类 DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
model.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
Database manager class responsible for managing MyBatis configuration and mapper instances. This class initializes the database connection and provides access to all mapper interfaces for database operations throughout the application.
从以下版本开始:
1.0

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    DatabaseManager()
    Constructor that initializes the database connection and all mapper instances.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • DatabaseManager

      public DatabaseManager()
      Constructor that initializes the database connection and all mapper instances. Loads the MyBatis configuration from mybatis-config.xml and creates mapper instances.
